topic.name: Social Skills & Communication
topic.description: 13-year academic progression (K-12) for Social Skills & Communication in Personal Relationships, Identity & Digital Discipleship

objectives.objective_text: Identify how a friend feels (sad/happy).
Name kindness.
Identify a stereotype (a guess about a group).
Identify rude behavior.
Identify how to behave in a theater.

objectives.sub_topic_name: Reading Social Cues and Body Language
objectives.objective_text: Identify a smile vs. a frown.

objectives.sub_topic_name: Reading Social Cues and Body Language
objectives.objective_text: Name angry hands (fists).

objectives.sub_topic_name: Reading Social Cues and Body Language
objectives.objective_text: Identify sarcasm (saying one thing, meaning another).

objectives.sub_topic_name: The Art of Conversation (Active listening, asking good questions)
objectives.objective_text: Identify body language that shows interest.
Recall that people do things differently.
Observe a new food or custom.
Recall holding the door for others.
Recall chewing with mouth closed.

objectives.sub_topic_name: Reading Social Cues and Body Language
objectives.objective_text: Recall personal space (arm's length).

objectives.sub_topic_name: Reading Social Cues and Body Language
objectives.objective_text: Observe eye contact.

objectives.sub_topic_name: The Art of Conversation (Active listening, asking good questions)
objectives.objective_text: Recall not to interrupt.
Summarize 'Walk a mile in their shoes'.
Explain that different isn't bad.
Explain prejudice vs. preference.
Defend the dignity of every ethnicity (Revelation 7:9).
Say 'Please' and 'Thank you'.
Greet adults by name.
Wave hello.
Summarize why manners matter (makes people feel valued).
Explain how to introduce a friend.
Write a thank-you note.
Explain RSVP etiquette.
Defend manners as a liturgy of love.
Sit still in church or library.
Use an inside voice.
Wait in line patiently.
Summarize how to order food politely.
Explain respecting public property.
Dress appropriately for the occasion.
Explain tipping guidelines.
Defend the importance of ritual and decorum.

objectives.sub_topic_name: Reading Social Cues and Body Language
objectives.objective_text: Summarize what crossed arms might mean.

objectives.sub_topic_name: Reading Social Cues and Body Language
objectives.objective_text: Explain noticing when someone is bored.

objectives.sub_topic_name: Reading Social Cues and Body Language
objectives.objective_text: Adjust volume based on the room.

objectives.sub_topic_name: Reading Social Cues and Body Language
objectives.objective_text: Explain mirroring.

objectives.sub_topic_name: Reading Social Cues and Body Language
objectives.objective_text: Defend the importance of non-verbal communication.

objectives.sub_topic_name: The Art of Conversation (Active listening, asking good questions)
objectives.objective_text: Look at the person talking.

objectives.sub_topic_name: The Art of Conversation (Active listening, asking good questions)
objectives.objective_text: Take turns speaking.

objectives.sub_topic_name: The Art of Conversation (Active listening, asking good questions)
objectives.objective_text: Ask 'How are you?'.

objectives.sub_topic_name: The Art of Conversation (Active listening, asking good questions)
objectives.objective_text: Summarize what the other person said.

objectives.sub_topic_name: The Art of Conversation (Active listening, asking good questions)
objectives.objective_text: Explain open-ended questions (who, what, where).

objectives.sub_topic_name: The Art of Conversation (Active listening, asking good questions)
objectives.objective_text: Maintain a conversation for 3 turns.

objectives.sub_topic_name: The Art of Conversation (Active listening, asking good questions)
objectives.objective_text: Explain how to pivot a conversation topic gracefully.

objectives.sub_topic_name: The Art of Conversation (Active listening, asking good questions)
objectives.objective_text: Defend the value of face-to-face interaction.
Compare my tradition with another.
Analyze the danger of a 'Single Story'.
Interpret cultural context for behavior.
Connect the Great Commission to cultural curiosity.
Analyze the Golden Rule in social settings.
Interpret the etiquette of different situations (formal vs. casual).
Connect courtesy to Christian witness.
Analyze the expectations of a formal dinner.
Interpret the concept of 'shared space'.
Connect punctuality to respect for others.

objectives.objective_text: Analyze micro-expressions.

objectives.sub_topic_name: Reading Social Cues and Body Language
objectives.objective_text: Interpret silence in a conversation.

objectives.sub_topic_name: Reading Social Cues and Body Language
objectives.objective_text: Connect posture to confidence.

objectives.objective_text: Analyze the balance of talking vs. listening.

objectives.objective_text: Interpret tone of voice and subtext.

objectives.sub_topic_name: The Art of Conversation (Active listening, asking good questions)
objectives.objective_text: Connect empathy to listening.
Evaluate personal biases.
Evaluate the impact of civility on culture.
Evaluate behavior in diverse cultural settings.

objectives.sub_topic_name: Reading Social Cues and Body Language
objectives.objective_text: Evaluate the congruence between words and actions.

objectives.sub_topic_name: The Art of Conversation (Active listening, asking good questions)
objectives.objective_text: Evaluate personal listening barriers (distraction, judgment).
Construct a bridge across a cultural divide.
Synthesize cultural intelligence (CQ) with biblical love.
Construct a professional email or letter.
Synthesize cultural norms with universal respect.
Construct a plan for hosting a guest.
Synthesize social confidence with humility.

objectives.sub_topic_name: Reading Social Cues and Body Language
objectives.objective_text: Construct a strategy for reading a room.

objectives.sub_topic_name: Reading Social Cues and Body Language
objectives.objective_text: Synthesize intuition with observation.

objectives.objective_text: Construct deep questions to build connection.

objectives.sub_topic_name: The Art of Conversation (Active listening, asking good questions)
objectives.objective_text: Synthesize active listening techniques (reflection, validation).
